name: LLM Playground
description: Implemented full-stack application using React and FastAPI to interact with large language models

name: Social Learning in Multi-Agent Systems
description: Collaborated with a professor and several peers to apply insights from research on social networks to multi-agent reinforcement learning.

name: Content Market Model of Social Media Networks
description: Implemented and simulated model of social media networks as a content market to evaluate theoretical accuracy.

name: Fine-Tuning Stable Diffusion
description: Evaluated the efficacy of LoRA, Textual Inversion, and Dreambooth for introducing new concepts to diffusion image generators

name: GRIMM AutoFinance
description: Created and deployed a web application to help car buyers save time in the dealership

name: Wikipedia 6 Degrees of Separation
description: Represented Wikipedia article categories using a graph to model connections and implemented the PageRank algorithm to judge article importance and relevance.

name: Climate Change Snowfall Effects
description: Modeled the relationship between the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index and US Snowfall by region using Pandas and Plotly.
